= Introduction =

!ReLogo can be used to create and analyze models in Repast Simphony.
Detailed documentation about tool and !ReLogo can be found  [http://repast.sourceforge.net/docs.html here]

To start with !ReLogo, [http://repast.sourceforge.net/docs/ReLogoGettingStarted.pdf this] document can be of a great help

More advanced models can be made and new functions can be explored through the quick reference available [http://repast.sourceforge.net/docs/api/relogo/ReLogoPrimitives.html here]

The complete !ReLogo API can be found [http://repast.sourceforge.net/docs/api/relogo/index.html here]
